submission:
class Solution(object):
    def minimumSum(self, grid):
        """
        :type grid: List[List[int]]
        :rtype: int
        """
        def find(r1, c1, r2, c2):
            # print r1, c1, r2, c2
            i=r1
            v1, v2,  v3, v4 = -1, -1, -1, -1
            while i<=r2:
                j=c1
                while j<=c2:
                    if grid[i][j]==1:
                        if v1==-1:
                            v1, v2 = i, i
                            v3, v4 = j, j
                        v1=min(v1, i)
                        v2=max(v2, i)
                        v3=min(v3, j)
                        v4 = max(v4, j)
                    j+=1
                i+=1
            r =  (v2-v1+1)*(v4-v3+1)
            # print r1, c1, r2, c2, r
            
            if r==0: r=1
            return r
        r = 10000000
        m, n = len(grid), len(grid[0])
        # print m, n
        for i in range(m-1):
            v1 = find(0, 0, i, n-1)
            for j in range(n-1):
                v2 = find(i+1, 0, m-1, j)
                v3 = find(i+1, j+1, m-1, n-1)
                r = min(v1+v2+v3, r)
            for j in range(i+1, m-1):
                v2 = find(i+1, 0, j, n-1)
                v3 = find(j+1, 0, m-1, n-1)
                r = min(v1+v2+v3, r)
            v1 = find(i+1, 0, m-1, n-1)
            for j in range(n-1):
                v2 = find(0, 0, i, j)
                v3 = find(0, j+1, i, n-1)
                r = min(v1+v2+v3, r)
            
        # print "----"
        for j in range(n-1):
            v1 = find(0, 0, m-1, j)
            for i in range(m-1):
                v2 = find(0, j+1, i, n-1)
                v3 = find(i+1, j+1, m-1, n-1)
                r = min(v1+v2+v3, r)
            for i in range(j+1, n-1):
                v2 = find(0, j+1, m-1, i)
                v3 = find(0, i+1, m-1, n-1)
                # print "--", i, j, v1, v2, v3
                r = min(v1+v2+v3, r)
            v1 = find(0, j+1, m-1, n-1)
            for i in range(m-1):
                v2 = find(0, 0, i, j)
                v3 = find(i+1, 0, m-1, j)
                r = min(v1+v2+v3, r)
            
        return r
